doc.field: American Labor Conference on International Affairs Records
American Labor Conference on International Affairs Records

Manuscripts for Free Labor Contains: - "Can Labor Surrender Its Right to Strike?" 2pp. (3 copies) - "Congress Caught in Anti-Labor Eddy," 2pp. (3 copies) - "The Government's Wage and Price Policy," 2pp. (2 copies) - "Labor Elections in Germany," 2pp. (3 copies) - "Labor's Executive Council Meets," 2pp. (2 copies) - "The Problem of Italian Trade Unionism," 3pp. (3 copies) p - "The Reconstruction of the Austrian Trade Unions," 2 pp. (2 copies) - "Set the World Free, American Labor Urges," 2pp. (3 copies) - "Tax Reduction the Wrong Way," 2pp. (2 copies)
